profile:
After being in the industry for several years we’ve learned customer satisfaction and quality workmanship are the cornerstones of business in the construction industry and we at Oak Hills Roofing take pride in our work.  From the initial telephone conversation to the completed project, we’re here for you!
  
At Oak Hills Roofing not only do we specialize in roofing services to both residential and commercial customers but we also do eavestroughs, facia, soffits, siding, decks, fences and much more. In Ontario, we proudly serve Northumberland County, Durham Region, Peterborough, the Kawartha’s and the GTA.  We are professional, experienced, dependable and hard-working. Call or email anytime and request a free estimate. We are confident that we can provide you with a reasonable quote for quality workmanship!
 
Phone: 905-269-8839
Email contact for quotes: jay@oakhillsroofing.ca
https://www.facebook.com/oakhillsroofing/

profile:
With over 20 years of experience, Alan and his team are dedicated to providing customers with an exceptional experience. We know that dealing with contractors is not fun, often time consuming and let's face it, we generally don't trust them. We pride ourselves on our competitive quotes, quality workmanship and excellent customer service. Alan's team will make sure you know exactly what the process is, what materials will be used and the timeline you can expect. 
 
We service all of the GTA, and provide full or partial roof replacement, flashing, and emergency roof repairs.
 
*We also offer a referral incentive.

profile:
Trade-Rep Roofing & Exteriors is a Unique Roofing and Home Renovation Company that has combined the Most Qualified Building Trades with an Ethical and Efficient Business Model. For far too long property owners have been at the mercy of Tradesmen when searching for Transparent, Reliable & Qualified Building Professionals. With over 30 Years in the Renovation Industry and a Strong Business Acumen, Bill Covell has witnessed (and experienced) the Glaring Gap between Quality Tradesmen and an Acute Business Model. Over years of tweaking and refining, Bill and his team have Successfully Bridged That Gap. Trade-Rep’s combination of Top-Notch Tradespeople and Exceptionally High Standards & Processes is what affords our team the ability to deliver Outstanding Workmanship with Unparalleled Customer Service, at  Competitive Pricing. Trade-Rep is Committed to Serving & Respecting our Customers (and their properties) to the Very Best of Our Abilities. Our Skilled Trades are Fully Insured and Proficient at Completing Projects in a Timely and Fully Transparent Manner. You can Rest Assured that your project will be Completed Accurately, Safely and with Open Communication Every Step of the Way.

Our Commitment to Every Prospect & Customer:

Fast, Professional Communication & Quote Turnaround for both Residential & Commercial Projects

Free, Fast & Transparent Quotes with Detailed Scope of Work

Thorough Explanations of Processes & Options to Suit Budgets

Transparent Agreements with No Surprises

Open & Honest Communication from Start to Finish

All Projects are Fully Insured by a Minimum of $2-$5 Million Liability Insurance

All Trades are Covered by WSIB & Safety Certificates

All Workmanship Above Ontario’s Building Code & Manufacturer’s Specifications

Utilize Only Quality Products & Materials

Competitive Pricing

Bona Fide Workmanship & Manufacturer Warranties

Committed to Schedules, Budgets & Clear Communication Throughout each Project

Unmatched Customer Service

For a Free, No-Obligation Quote, kindly Click on the Green "Get a Quote Button" at the top of our Profile or give us a call. One of our friendly staff will be Happy to Assist.

You Won’t be Disappointed!

profile:
Moffatt Bros. Roofing is dedicated to providing a high standard of service as dedicated roofing professionals. We strive to forge lasting relationships with our customers by providing them with high quality and timely service and to never forget that our satisfaction; our livelihood is made possible by serving our customers.
***
We listen carefully to our customers so we can understand your needs, problems or desires and to advise you conservatively using our years of experience, resources and those of our partners in the industry. We take care to respect our customers and their property and take all means necessary to protect people and property from damage or injury.
***
Our workers are factory trained for installing many different roofing systems from many different manufactures. We can shingle your roof or make it into a metal roof depending on what you want. For information on our residential products view the Sloped roofs  section. For places with a flat roof there are a number of options that can be put on your roof. If you have a flat roof check out the BUR and Single Ply Membrane  sections. There are links to our suppliers on the products pages or you can look at the suppliers page and visit their pages from there. To view some of our previously completed roofs feel free to view the Projects page.
***
Moffatt Bros. Roofing is dedicated to providing a high standard of service as dedicated roofing professionals. We try to forge lasting relationships with our customers by providing them with high quality and timely service and to never forget that our satisfaction; our livelihood is made possible by serving our customers.
products: GAF Timberline HD Shingles, Many types and styles of Steel roofing systems, Industrial / Commercial EPDM, TPO single ply roofing. We also install Duradek vinyl membranes.
services: Moffatt Bros also offers a number of different services. We will come to your aid with Emergency Repairs, we can do a Roof Inspection on your roof for any possible damage or problems, and we also assist with Mechanical Installations. Visit the Contact Us page for information on how to get in contact with us by phone or email and feel free to contact us for any additional information you may require

profile:
Quality Canadian Home Improvements has been in business for over 20 years offering professional roofing and home improvement services. Our head office is located near Cobourg in Grafton Ontario.  Our central location allows us to offer our roofing services to the Durham Region, Peterborough, Cobourg, Port Hope, Brighton, Grafton, and all surrounding areas. Our reputation is important to us, and it shows. We don’t leave your job site until you are happy. We are a family owned company, dedicated to customer service and quality workmanship.  Our staff are trained, certified, insured and we offer a 25 year labour warranty on all shingle and steel roof jobs completed by our corporation.  Our professional roofing services include new roofs, roof replacement, roof repair, eaves-trough and aluminum work.  We service both residential and commercial roofing projects.  Our quotes are always free, with no obligation attached.

For over 20 years Quality Canadian Home Improvements has been your best choice in expert roofing companies!
